title: Hasan Minhaj
description:
Kevin talks with comedian Hasan Minhaj about his comedic beginnings, his experiences with The Daily Show and Netflix’s Patriot Act, and how his father’s expectations lead him down a different path to success.

Like Comedy Gold Minds? SiriusXM subscribers get it a day early, plus Kevin Hart’s Laugh Out Loud Radio, his 24/7 comedy channel, with great talk shows and stand-up. Learn more / check it out for 3 months at siriusxm.com/comedygoldminds.
author: podcasts@siriusxm.com (hasan minhaj, kevin hart)
